definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Miss Athill did not keep the letters she received from Mr Field.
sentences.chinese: 阿西尔女士并没有保留菲尔德先生写给她的信件。

sentences.english: This message contains a request to return a notification about your reception of the message.
sentences.chinese: 这封信要求回复信件处理通知给寄件者。

sentences.english: This afternoon Tietz declared the letter to be a forgery.
sentences.chinese: 当天下午Tietz声明信件是伪造的。

sentences.english: He has usually finished all his correspondence before bedtime.
sentences.chinese: 他通常都在就寝前将所有信件处理完毕。

sentences.english: It can be difficult to keep your email address spam-free.
sentences.chinese: 让你的电邮地址没有垃圾信件是困难的事。
投诉的信件潮涌般寄来。

sentences.english: It gave the job of carrying the letters to a new company -- the Overland Mail Company.
sentences.chinese: 联邦政府将邮递信件的任务交给了美国陆路邮递公司。

sentences.english: We publish about 35 letters each week.
sentences.chinese: 我们每周大约发表35封信件。
请打出上部箱子中的信件。

sentences.english: Her Social Security card remained in her papers, the original envelope unopened.
sentences.chinese: 她的社保卡仍然在她的信件里，封口一直没拆开过。

sentences.english: A clerk thumbed through the files looking for a letter.
sentences.chinese: 办事员翻遍了案卷，寻找一封信件。

sentences.english: It's not moral to read the personal letter without permission.
sentences.chinese: 未经允许拆阅个人信件不道德。

sentences.english: Letters, maps, and pictures are documents.
sentences.chinese: 信件，挂图，图片都是文献。

sentences.english: The work of "Deliver" was created with the inspiration from postmen.
sentences.chinese: 《传递》这一作品，我是从邮差投递信件想到的。

sentences.english: E. Tuesday afternoon the letters were sorted.
sentences.chinese: 星期二下午，工作人员开始给这些信件分类。

definition: to reply/to write back/letter written in reply/CL:封[feng1]
secret documents/abbr. for 機密文件|机密文件
